title: Engine Identification Number (Z 20 LET)

steps.text: The engine identification number is engraved on the edge of the transmission attachment flange on the cylinder block. Note: Before installation of a short-block, the original engine number must be engraved on the replacement cylinder block.

notes:
The engine identification number is engraved on the edge of the
transmission attachment flange on the cylinder block.
 Before
installation of a short-block, the original engine number must be
engraved on the replacement cylinder block.
